page.title: 17Ashbourne's Favourite Points
page.content: We did a survey on what people like best about Ashbourne.The two favourites were the Shrovetide football game and the swimming baths. Lots of people like the Countryside best aswell. Two people in this school like going church best.One person likes Queen Elizabeths Grammar School. The park as well seemed quite popular. One person liked playing for Aztecs football team. People also like going to the carnival during the summer. The antique shops are popular with tourists but not with residents. Perhaps the best loved feature is not in the town at all but in the nearby countryside. Dovedale provides us with beautiful scenery leading northwards into the Derbyshire Dales.
